attributes.title: I HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP
attributes.review: When I opened this apple I was disgusted to find an orange on my screen my phone almost cracked DO NOT DOWNLOAD it’s is unsafe and will cause damage to you device such as a cracked screen bc of the ugly orange that will appear. Your welcome 😌

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a disgusting, racist, homophobic PIG on my screen. Not only does this app promote racists and r@pists, but actually encourages you to support them. WHAT TYPE OF FUDGERY IS THIS?!🙈i encourage everyone to stop using this app immediately.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤡💩💀👹🤮🤢
